Comment.Text: NextDialogFlog: mark to go to next dialog or not bullyStart: user finishs filling the basic information at beginning stickmanName: indicate which character the user want to talk with

CallingExpression.name: SendTextContent
CallingExpression.StringLiteral: Please read: Hey everybody!

CallingExpression.name: SendTextContent
CallingExpression.StringLiteral: Left click the character to talk with Paula, Marie or Chris.

CallingExpression.name: SendTextContent
CallingExpression.StringLiteral: Please read: Hey Chris. You made that picture?

CallingExpression.name: SendTextContent
CallingExpression.StringLiteral: Please read: Every child with a tablet could do that.

CallingExpression.name: SendTextContent
CallingExpression.StringLiteral: Please read: About that guy on the picture.

CallingExpression.name: SendTextContent
CallingExpression.StringLiteral: Please read: Maybe you should not have posted it on the internet.

CallingExpression.name: SendTextContent
CallingExpression.StringLiteral: Please read: It is not nice doing such things to people!

CallingExpression.name: changeStickmanName
CallingExpression.StringLiteral: unknown

CallingExpression.name: SendTextContent
CallingExpression.StringLiteral: Please read: Hey Paula. How are you doing!

CallingExpression.name: SendTextContent
CallingExpression.StringLiteral: Please read: I do not know, I have a bad feeling about this.

CallingExpression.name: SendTextContent
CallingExpression.StringLiteral: Please read: But, do not you think we will get in trouble?

CallingExpression.name: SendTextContent
CallingExpression.StringLiteral: Please read: You are right, I guess he will not have the balls.

CallingExpression.name: changeStickmanName
CallingExpression.StringLiteral: unknown

CallingExpression.name: SendTextContent
CallingExpression.StringLiteral: Please read: Hi Marie. Is everything alright?

CallingExpression.name: SendTextContent
CallingExpression.StringLiteral: Please read: You do not look happy today.

CallingExpression.name: SendTextContent
CallingExpression.StringLiteral: Please read: You are talking about that picture?

CallingExpression.name: SendTextContent
CallingExpression.StringLiteral: Please read: I do not like it either.
